stripped_text: When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card. When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost. trash: Draw 1 card.
text:
When you install Muertos Gang Member, the Corp must derez a card.
When Muertos Gang Member is uninstalled, the Corp may rez a card, ignoring the rez cost.
[trash]: Draw 1 card.
title: Muertos Gang Member
